header.name: chaos/preprocessor/recursion/delay.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro that delays the invocation of a macro.

macro.abstract: The macro delays the expansion of a macro through an arbitrary number of scans.

usage.param: The number of scans through which the invocation of macro should delayed. Valid values range from 0 to .
The macro whose invocation is to be delayed.

macro.para: This macro delays the invocation of macro through count scans.

Normal usage includes the invocation of this macro followed by the argument list to macro. For example,
#define MACRO(a, b, c) // ... (5, MACRO)(~, ~, ~)
